channel.title: Portforwarding with 3G Modem
channel.description: I need help putting my server online. I don't have a router I have a Virgin Mobile 3G modem. (Don't hate). I was wondering if I could host with this (has to be a way since I have internet access). I've heard about Utorrent and I put the port on their to 43594 and everything that the guides say. Still nothing. So if someone could help me I'd really appreciate it.

item.title: Portforwarding with 3G Modem
item.dc:creator: @coryallen1 coryallen1
item.description:
@coryallen1 wrote:

I need help putting my server online. I don’t have a router I have a Virgin Mobile 3G modem. (Don’t hate). I was wondering if I could host with this (has to be a way since I have internet access). I’ve heard about Utorrent and I put the port on their to 43594 and everything that the guides say. Still nothing. So if someone could help me I’d really appreciate it.
